name: One Winter Morning - Demo
description:
Gruesome Angela Games proudly present demo of "One Winter Morning" - a 2d, top-down zombie apocalypse in the setting of communist housing blocks. Enjoy around 120 seconds of pure retro-mayhem!

Synopsis:

The day before was nothing out of the ordinary. You came back from work to your concrete box and fell asleep listening to your neighbours arguing, watching tv and flushing down the toilet. At night you were awaken by a strange light - there was a weird blaze over the small forest on the edge of the housing estate. You thought nothing of it and went back to sleep. Next morning loud screams woke you up. Fucking bums must have started the morning shift earlier than usually. You looked through the window - there were some goddamn zombies eating people there! Thank god you still had your grandfather's rifle under your bed - at least this day will be a bit out of the ordinary...

Controls:

  • arrows - movement
  • ctrl - fire
  • esc - pause

When in pause mode:

  • esc - resume
  • r - restart
  • q - quit
